commit message: Added extra logging of save/restore adapter state
Added IllegalStateException catch in adapter's restoreState()
Added comment explaining necessary of IllegalStateException try/catch
Added progress spinner when requesting more posts
fix test manifest of wpcomrest to work with android-gradle 0.14.0
fix #1981: catch OOM exceptions around mixpanel _People_ write access

Set getDiffableValue() as synchronized in the Note model.

Fixes #1982

No need for AndroidAsync snapshot any longer.

AndroidAsync released an update, and Simperium 0.4.12 will use it.
Return a copy of the JSONObject in getDiffableValue().

Merge pull request #1990 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1982-simperium-concurrency-exception

Fix Simperium concurrency exception
